title: Application Theme gets reseted to default after installing a new update
author: achitulea
body_snippet:
The checkbox _Enable Themes_ is checked and the selected theme is _vs2015blue_.
When I checked for updates and installed the latest stable update 1.76.16 (2019-03-14) through application Help -> Check for updated -> install update -> restart the application, the selected theme was reseted to default and the checkbox _Enable _Themes_ was unchecked.


## Expected Behavior
The application's theme should not be changed to default when updating to a newer version, it should be preserved instead ...

iterations.description: Settings.Upgrade() is only called on Properties.Settings.Default but not on Properties.OptionsThemePage.Default, so theme preference is lost when version changes

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet:
This will be resolved when #690 is implemented. Scheduled for 1.77

This impact all user settings, not just themes.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Settings.Upgrade() is only called on Properties.Settings.Default but not on Properties.OptionsThemePage.Default, so theme preference is lost when version changes
Approach: Add Properties.OptionsThemePage.Default.Upgrade() (and all other split settings classes like OptionsAppearancePage, OptionsConnectionsPage, etc.) to UpgradeSettingsVersion() so all user preferences survive version upgrades
